laptop.description: Switch your lid to match your mood. A 13.3" laptop with 3rd Gen Intel Core processor power and optional SWITCH lids
laptop.technical-details: Intel 2nd gen Core i3-2367 1.40GHz 1.40 GHz (6MB Cache) 6 GB DIMM 500GB 5400 rpm SATA Hard Drive 13-Inch Screen Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit

laptop.description: Strikingly thin, with more room to view.
laptop.technical-details: Intel Core i7-2637M (1.70GHz, 4MB Cache) 4 GB DIMM 256GB Solid State Drive 13-Inch Screen Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
